en: Defalut spells are selected at the start of the level
You can change difficulty in the settings menu (gear icon)
Character levels up when you get upgrades and gives you small buffs
Left mouse click to select spell fot the left hand
Right mouse click to select spell fot the right hand

ru: Вы вернетесь в первый день, но со всем своим снаряжением

en: For max level of all fire magic
For max level of all earth magic
For max level of all water magic
For max level of all air magic
Spells level up by using them. All inflicted damge converts into experience
Basic spell of air magic. Ball of compressed air.
Advanced spell of air magic. A moving disturbance in air density forming a miniature tornado. Explodes on hit.
Advanced spell of air magic. Miniature thunderclouds forming a high-voltage lightning discharge.
Basic spell of earth magic. Small rock that can be thrown at high speed.
Advanced spell of earth magic. Huge lump that can be thrown at high speed.
Advanced spell of earth magic. A lot of tiny rocks that can be thrown at very high speed comparable to a Gatling gun.
Basic spell of fire magic. Ball of pure fire.
Advanced spell of fire magic. Ball of untamed fire essence. Explodes on hit.
Advanced spell of fire magic. A continuous stream of incinerating fiery energy.
Basic spell of water magic. Crystallized water in the form of a sharp shard.
Advanced spell of water magic. Crystallized water in the form of a sharp lance.
Advanced spell of water magic. A continuous stream of freezing cold.
Theoretical foundations of advanced air magic. Allows you to improve practical skills of Tornado and Thunder.
Theoretical foundations of advanced earth magic. Allows you to improve practical skills of Lump and Stone Gatling.
Theoretical foundations of advanced fire magic. Allows you to improve practical skills of Inferno and Fire Beam.
Theoretical foundations of advanced water magic. Allows you to improve practical skills of Ice Lance and Ice Beam.
Theoretical foundations of basic air magic. Allows you to improve practical skills of Airball.
Theoretical foundations of basic earth magic. Allows you to improve practical skills of Rock.
Theoretical foundations of basic fire magic. Allows you to improve practical skills of Fireball.
Theoretical foundations of basic water magic. Allows you to improve practical skills of Ice Arrow.
Special training to increase all spell damage.
Special training to increase your body's endurance.
A special ritual to improve the favor of the gods.
Special training to increase your leg speed.
